description:
If you have recently purchased or plan to use the Panasonic Lumix GH4 as your primary camera, this is the course for you. Even if you've never used a DSLR before, this course will work to build your understanding of both the camera and general photography from the ground up.

This is a relatively short course â€“ about four and a half hours is all it takes to become a master with this camera. Lectures are 100% easy-to-follow videos, with plenty of clear diagrams that will construct your understanding of the camera dynamically.
title: Panasonic Lumix GH4 for Beginners
